overview:
Telemarketing & Lead Generation Specialist | Inside Sales Callbox

*Increase the sales ratios of your business with Sales Lead Generation and Appointment Setting Program. *Responsible of providing high quality results & work world-class sales lead professionals.

Main Responsibilities:

-sell Callbox lead generation and appointment setting program to companies all over North America. -meet and or exceed the assigned quota. -Independently develop processes to obtain leads through different channels. -Maintain accurate up-to-date sales pipeline and forecasts;

Main Qualities include:

-Strong sales skills, including internal reporting; -Excellent verbal and written communication skills; -Ability to work within a fast-paced and constantly changing environment; -Exceptional organizational skills; -Talent for effectively interacting with individuals at all levels of the organization; -Flexibility to work long and unpredictable hours to match availability of physicians; -Self motivated to work independently, with team support, to close business; -Demonstrated commitment to completing tasks and objectives; -Possess a good sense of humor as well as good judgment in displaying it; -A team player, and one who is open to feedback and on-going self development; -A true professional possessing the highest ethical and moral standards; -Ability to maintain a positive attitude at all times;
